mapper.sql: id, unit_num, meas_unit_name, sort, effe_inval_state, dimensions_type,trans_xs, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT id, meas_unit_name,unit_num,dimensions_type,trans_xs, sort, effe_inval_state FROM zhfw_meas_unit_mage
AND instr(meas_unit_name,#{measUnitName}) != 0
AND instr(dimensions_type,#{dimensionsType}) != 0
AND instr(effe_inval_state,#{effeInvalState}) != 0
AND del_flag != '1' ORDER BY sort ASC
SELECT meas_unit_name FROM zhfw_meas_unit_mage WHERE del_flag != '1'
SELECT id FROM zhfw_meas_unit_mage WHERE del_flag = '0' AND unit_num = #{unitNum} and meas_unit_name = #{measUnitName}

mapper.update:
update zhfw_meas_unit_mage
unit_num = #{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meas_unit_name = #{measUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
effe_inval_state = #{effeInvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dimensions_type = #{dimensionsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trans_xs = #{transXs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update zhfw_meas_unit_mage set unit_num = #{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meas_unit_name = #{measUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, effe_inval_state = #{effeInvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dimensions_type = #{dimensionsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_xs = #{transXs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id id, unit_num unitNum, meas_unit_name measUnitName, sort sort, effe_inval_state effeInvalState, dimensions_type dimensionsType from zhfw_meas_unit_mage where del_flag = '0'
select id id, unit_num unitNum, meas_unit_name measUnitName, sort sort, effe_inval_state effeInvalState, dimensions_type dimensionsType from zhfw_meas_unit_mage where del_flag = '0' and id = #{id}
SELECT id, meas_unit_name,unit_num,dimensions_type,trans_xs, sort, effe_inval_state FROM zhfw_meas_unit_mage where dimensions_type = #{dimensionsType}
